titles.title: He Heard Me, He Heard Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He heard me, He heard me.
With all of my heart I cried to Him and He heard me,
And He answered and said, Follow me, and said, Follow me.
I've taken the shackles off your feet,
Your dancing toes can now keep beat
To the rhythm of the song
I've put in your heart;
Follow Me, follow Me.
